title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1098/94 of 11 May 1994 laying down the regional base areas applicable under the support system for producers of certain arable crops and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 845/93
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1098/94 of 11 May 1994 laying down the regional base areas applicable under the support system for producers of certain arable crops and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 845/93
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: The base areas referred to in Article 2 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92 shall be as shown in the Annex.

Regulation (EEC) No 845/93 is hereby repealed.
References to the repealed Regulation pursuant to this Article shall be understood as references to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 May 1994.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 181, 1. 7. 1992, p. 12.
(2) OJ No L 30, 3. 2. 1994, p. 7.
(3) OJ No L 88, 8. 4. 1993, p. 27.
(4) OJ No L 107, 28. 4. 1994, p. 25.
